Summary: Glowing dull red, dimmed to grey, very slowly wobbled away.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking back from the gas station, saw what I thought was Mars. Circle or sphere glowing a dull red, hovering in place. As I stopped and stared at it, the red glow dimmed away, leaving the craft looking a grey color. It slowly and steadily drifted over all the apartment complexes on my road, wobbling slightly (best way I can describe it) as it went, until it was out of sight. I tried to take photos and video with my phone but it's a total piece. Zoomed one picture where *something* showed up, but it looks really bad.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around July 26th 2012
